short_summary: Consulting services to assess and develop the potential for a world-class industrial bioprocessing ecosystem and bioproduct manufacturing sector in Nova Scotia and Canada.
description: This notice references a contract awarded by the Atlantic Canada Opportunities Agency, for consulting services to conduct an industrial bioprocessing and bioproduct manufacturing sector study in Nova Scotia and Canada. The proposal includes market demand and trends research, existing infrastructure and expertise analysis, regional innovation ecosystem gaps identification, and feasibility assessments for bioprocessing and bioproduct manufacturing. The study aims to develop a comprehensive jurisdictional scan, provide an analysis of global and national biotechnology markets, and assess opportunities and challenges for bioprocessing and bioproduct manufacturing in Nova Scotia and Canada. The notice identifies Davis Pier Consulting as the pre-identified supplier selected for this contract.
